name: QuestionnaireCCARSAggressionDangerToOthersRating
title: Questionnaire CCARS Aggression Danger To Others Rating
description: Extent of aggressiveness in interactions with others.

concept.display: Occasional low-level aggressive behavior toward others
Occasional major or frequent minor aggressive behavior which is perceived as dangerous
Repeated major behavior that is problematic and is hostile, threatening and dangerous
Continuously aggressive behavior that is intended to inflict injury or pain, verbal attacks and or demonstrates imminent danger to others
